channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Overnight -- PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Overnight -- PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-22147|2024-01-26T23:15:02.859Z -- wp%20overnight -- pdf%20invoices%20%26%20packing%20slips%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in WP Overnight PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce.This issue affects PDF Invoices & Packing Slips for WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.7.5.
